meaningMnemonic: Usually if you're going to the left in Japanese, it's not a good thing. So if you <kanji>transition</kanji> to the <kanji>left</kanji> it's seen as a <vocabulary>demotion</vocabulary>. Going to the right is way better.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
